subject.description: The element ID that the relationship originates from (from URL path)

object.description: The element ID that the relationship points to

relationshipType.description: The type of relationship from subject's perspective

relationshipTypeInverse.description: The inverse relationship type from object's perspective

name.description: Human-readable name of the related object

typeId.description: Type identifier of the related object

parentId.description: Required per 3.1.1: the ElementId of the parent object

hasChildren.description: Required per 3.1.1: boolean indicating if the element is composed of one or more child objects

namespaceUri.description: Required per 3.1.1: URI indicating the Namespace of the object

fqn.description: Fully Qualified Name - the complete hierarchical path identifier for the element within its namespace

created_at.description: Timestamp of when the instance was created in the system
